Set.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rationalism[ENDCOLOR] improves the ability to use and generate [ICON_RESEARCH] Science.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Rationalism will grant +10% [ICON_RESEARCH] Science while the empire is [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happy. Unlocks building the Porcelain Tower.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Reveals [ICON_RES_TITANIUM]Titanium resource.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all Policies in the Rationalism tree will grant a free Technology. It also allows the purchase of Great Scientists with [ICON_PEACE] Faith starting in the Industrial Era.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Piety[ENDCOLOR] increases the [ICON_PEACE] Faith of empires.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Piety allows you to build Shrines and Temples in half the usual time. Unlocks building the Great Mosque of Djenne.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Reveals [ICON_RES_ALOEVERA] Aloe Vera and [ICON_RES_WILDBERRIES] Wild Berries resources.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all Policies in the Piety tree causes a Great Prophet to appear and Holy Sites provide +3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Liberty[ENDCOLOR] is best for civilizations which desire rapid expansion.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Liberty will provide 1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in every city. Unlocks building the Pyramids.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Reveals [ICON_RES_TIN] Tin and [ICON_RES_AMBER] Amber resources.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all policies in the Liberty tree will grant a free Great Person of your choice near the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Tradition[ENDCOLOR] is best for small empires.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Tradition greatly increases the rate of border expansion in cities and also grants 3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital. Unlocks building the Hanging Gardens.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Reveals [ICON_RES_COCONUT] Coconut and [ICON_RES_MANGO] Mango resources.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all Policies in the Tradition tree will grant +15% [ICON_FOOD] Growth and a free Aqueduct in your first 4 cities. It also allows the purchase of Great Engineers with [ICON_PEACE] Faith starting in the Industrial Era.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Honor[ENDCOLOR] improves the effectiveness of one's army in a variety of ways.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Honor gives a +33% combat bonus VS Barbarians, and notifications will be provided when new Barbarian Encampments spawn in revealed territory. Gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for the empire from each barbarian killed. Unlocks building the Statue of Zeus.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Reveals [ICON_RES_FLAX] Flax resource.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all policies in the Honor tree will grant [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each enemy unit killed. It also allows the purchase of Great Generals with [ICON_PEACE] Faith starting in the Industrial Era.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Commerce[ENDCOLOR] provides bonuses to empires focused on [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Commerce will boost [ICON_GOLD] Gold output in [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital City by 25%. Unlocks building Big Ben.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Reveals [ICON_RES_RUBBER] Rubber, [ICON_RES_JADE] Jade, [ICON_RES_MANGANESE] Manganese and [ICON_RES_POPPY] Poppy.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all Policies in the Commerce tree will grant +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from every Trading Post and double [ICON_GOLD] Gold from Great Merchant trade missions. It also allows the purchase of Great Merchants with [ICON_PEACE] Faith starting in the Industrial Era

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Exploration[ENDCOLOR] enhances your abilties to spread your empire over the seas.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Exploration gives +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement for Naval units and +1 Sight for Naval combat units. Unlocks building the Louvre.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Reveals [ICON_RES_COFFEE] Coffee, [ICON_RES_TOBACCO] Tobacco and [ICON_RES_CACAO] Cacao Trees resources.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all policies allows you to see Hidden Antiquity Sites. It also allows the purchase of Great Admirals with [ICON_PEACE] Faith starting in the Industrial Era.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Aesthetics[ENDCOLOR] improves the civilization's ability to generate [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Aesthetics allows you to earn Great Writers, Artists, and Musicians 25% faster. Unlocks building the Uffizi.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_RES_EXOTICHARDWOOD] Exotic Wood resource.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all policies doubles the theming bonus you receive from Museums and Wonders. It also allows the purchase of Great Writers, Artists, or Musicians with [ICON_PEACE] Faith starting in the Industrial Era.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Patronage[ENDCOLOR] enhances the benefits of City-State friendship.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting Patronage will cause [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with City-States to degrade 25% slower than normal. Unlocks building the Forbidden Palace.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_RES_TEA] Tea resource.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Adopting all policies in the Patronage tree will cause allied City-States to occasionally gift you [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great People.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Protectionism[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from each Luxury resource.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants access to the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT] Merchants Guild [ENDCOLOR] National Wonder.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Scientific Revolution[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Boosts [ICON_RESEARCH] Science gained from research agreements by 50%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Grants access to the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT] Military Academy of Excellence[ENDCOLOR] National Wonder.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Representation[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Each city you found will increase the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost of policies by 33% less than normal. Also starts a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Grants access to the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Lords Manor[ENDCOLOR] National Wonder.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Monarchy[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and -1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness for every 2 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in the [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants access to the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Knights Castle[ENDCOLOR] National Wonder.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Professional Army[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_GOLD] Gold cost of upgrading Military Units reduced by 33% and +1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from every defensive building (Walls, Castle, Arsenal, Military Base).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants access to the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Militia Barracks[ENDCOLOR] National Wonder.
Get to choose a Reformation Belief.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Grants access to the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fortified Abbey National Wonder.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Cultural Diplomacy[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Quantity of Resources gifted by City-States increased by 100%. [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness from gifted Luxuries increased by 50%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Grants access to the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Great Hall[ENDCOLOR] National Wonder.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Treasure Fleets[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from all your sea trade routes.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Grants access to the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Merchants Warf[ENDCOLOR] National Wonder.

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Ethics[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE]Reduces the [ICON_CULTURE] Culture cost of future Policies by 10%.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Grants access to the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Grand Hall[ENDCOLOR] National Wonder.
